report.title: View Data
report.description: Report to display the map on the View Data page on Earthworm Watch. Respects privacy precision.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional csf JOIN cache_occurrences_functional cof on cof.sample_id=csf.id WHERE #website_filter# AND csf.survey_id = #survey_id# AND ((cof.training=false AND #training_records#!=1) or (cof.training=true AND #training_records#=1))

param.name: survey_id
param.description: ID of the survey to show data for.
